# Credentials  format

## Algorithmia

File: `algorithmia.json`
```
{
    "apiKey": "sim1566149819815331564468"
}
```

## Watson Natural Language Understanding

File: `whatson-nlu.json`

```
{
  "apikey": "emX6KLAWF8RBUyMosd_JmxPdDU45tLDW0jYO-a2AQceW",
  "iam_apikey_description": "Auto-generated for key 27b1d041-13b6-4438-b209-b0f6bf5634e2",
  "iam_apikey_name": "Auto-generated service credentials",
  "iam_role_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam::::serviceRole:Manager",
  "iam_serviceid_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam-identity::a/4605428b121a446dbeeedebcf742523b::serviceid:ServiceId-247c1b9e-3605-4e69-a830-fb3abf8991f2",
  "url": "https://api.au-syd.natural-language-understanding.watson.cloud.ibm.com/instances/34bd3366-a275-4427-ae67-7ed63ad90fe1"
}
```
